title: Combine Recap - OL, RB, & ST + Player Interviews
itunes:title: Combine Recap - OL, RB, & ST + Player Interviews
description:
Bucky Brooks and Lance Zierlein are back with a special new episode from the 2020 NFL Scouting Combine. To start off, the guys recap what they saw from the offensive linemen at the combine (:54). After that, Bucky talks with Iowa offensive lineman Tristan Wirfs about his impressive combine performance (14:26). Next, the pair analyze which running backs stood out at the combine (19:26). Then, Bucky interviews Ohio State running back J.K. Dobbins about competing at a school like Ohio State (28:28). Next, Bucky talks with Georgia running back D'Andre Swift about his versatility as a player (34:18). To wrap up the show, the guys discuss a special teams player who performed well in the bench press (38:50).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
